item.title: Burnt fences due to fire, 26th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Calvin Close, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Overhanging vegetation on north cray road, 26th August
item.description:
In the central vegetation ( the grass middle section between each duel carriage way) just after the entry to st james way there is some large over hanging vegetation and this has caused a resident to scratch the side of his van its over hanging that must. If a motor cyclist was to come past this it would block there view and could be dangerous. please can this be looked into.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Cray Road, North Cray, London
